mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.exam_no AS "examNo", a.patient_id AS "patientId", a.visit_id AS "visitId", a.local_id_class AS "localIdClass", a.patient_local_id AS "patientLocalId", a.name AS "name", a.name_phonetic AS "namePhonetic", a.sex AS "sex", a.date_of_birth AS "dateOfBirth", a.birth_place AS "birthPlace", a.identity AS "identity", a.charge_type AS "chargeType", a.mailing_address AS "mailingAddress", a.zip_code AS "zipCode", a.phone_number AS "phoneNumber", a.exam_class AS "examClass", a.exam_sub_class AS "examSubClass", a.clin_symp AS "clinSymp", a.phys_sign AS "physSign", a.relevant_lab_test AS "relevantLabTest", a.relevant_diag AS "relevantDiag", a.clin_diag AS "clinDiag", a.exam_mode AS "examMode", a.exam_group AS "examGroup", a.performed_by AS "performedBy", a.patient_source AS "patientSource", a.facility AS "facility", a.req_date_time AS "reqDateTime", a.req_dept AS "reqDept", a.req_physician AS "reqPhysician", a.req_memo AS "reqMemo", a.scheduled_date AS "scheduledDate", a.notice AS "notice", a.costs AS "costs", a.charges AS "charges", a.doctor_user AS "doctorUser", a.worked_indicator AS "workedIndicator", a.isread AS "isread", a.emergency_indicator AS "emergencyIndicator", a.billing_indicator AS "billingIndicator", a.cnslt_state AS "cnsltState", a.queue_no AS "queueNo", a.device AS "device", a.time_interval AS "timeInterval", a.equipment_no AS "equipmentNo", a.visit_no AS "visitNo", a.register AS "register", a.reg_prn_flag AS "regPrnFlag", a.cnslt_no AS "cnsltNo", a.exam_reason AS "examReason", a.priority_indicator AS "priorityIndicator", a.special_indicator AS "specialIndicator", a.share_exam_no AS "shareExamNo", a.pause_indicator AS "pauseIndicator", a.db_user AS "dbUser", a.cnslt_name AS "cnsltName", a.print_status AS "printStatus", a.ward_code AS "wardCode", a.rcpt_no AS "rcptNo", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exam_appoints( id, exam_no, patient_id, visit_id, local_id_class, patient_local_id, name, name_phonetic, sex, date_of_birth, birth_place, identity, charge_type, mailing_address, zip_code, phone_number, exam_class, exam_sub_class, clin_symp, phys_sign, relevant_lab_test, relevant_diag, clin_diag, exam_mode, exam_group, performed_by, patient_source, facility, req_date_time, req_dept, req_physician, req_memo, scheduled_date, notice, costs, charges, doctor_user, worked_indicator, isread, emergency_indicator, billing_indicator, cnslt_state, queue_no, device, time_interval, equipment_no, visit_no, register, reg_prn_flag, cnslt_no, exam_reason, priority_indicator, special_indicator, share_exam_no, pause_indicator, db_user, cnslt_name, print_status, ward_code, rcpt_no, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{examNo}, #{patientId}, #{visitId}, #{localIdClass}, #{patientLocalId}, #{name}, #{namePhonetic}, #{sex}, #{dateOfBirth}, #{birthPlace}, #{identity}, #{chargeType}, #{mailingAddress}, #{zipCode}, #{phoneNumber}, #{examClass}, #{examSubClass}, #{clinSymp}, #{physSign}, #{relevantLabTest}, #{relevantDiag}, #{clinDiag}, #{examMode}, #{examGroup}, #{performedBy}, #{patientSource}, #{facility}, #{reqDateTime}, #{reqDept}, #{reqPhysician}, #{reqMemo}, #{scheduledDate}, #{notice}, #{costs}, #{charges}, #{doctorUser}, #{workedIndicator}, #{isread}, #{emergencyIndicator}, #{billingIndicator}, #{cnsltState}, #{queueNo}, #{device}, #{timeInterval}, #{equipmentNo}, #{visitNo}, #{register}, #{regPrnFlag}, #{cnsltNo}, #{examReason}, #{priorityIndicator}, #{specialIndicator}, #{shareExamNo}, #{pauseIndicator}, #{dbUser}, #{cnsltName}, #{printStatus}, #{wardCode}, #{rcptNo}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE exam_appoints SET exam_no = #{examNo}, patient_id = #{patientId}, visit_id = #{visitId}, local_id_class = #{localIdClass}, patient_local_id = #{patientLocalId}, name = #{name}, name_phonetic = #{namePhonetic}, sex = #{sex}, date_of_birth = #{dateOfBirth}, birth_place = #{birthPlace}, identity = #{identity}, charge_type = #{chargeType}, mailing_address = #{mailingAddress}, zip_code = #{zipCode}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, exam_class = #{examClass}, exam_sub_class = #{examSubClass}, clin_symp = #{clinSymp}, phys_sign = #{physSign}, relevant_lab_test = #{relevantLabTest}, relevant_diag = #{relevantDiag}, clin_diag = #{clinDiag}, exam_mode = #{examMode}, exam_group = #{examGroup}, performed_by = #{performedBy}, patient_source = #{patientSource}, facility = #{facility}, req_date_time = #{reqDateTime}, req_dept = #{reqDept}, req_physician = #{reqPhysician}, req_memo = #{reqMemo}, scheduled_date = #{scheduledDate}, notice = #{notice}, costs = #{costs}, charges = #{charges}, doctor_user = #{doctorUser}, worked_indicator = #{workedIndicator}, isread = #{isread}, emergency_indicator = #{emergencyIndicator}, billing_indicator = #{billingIndicator}, cnslt_state = #{cnsltState}, queue_no = #{queueNo}, device = #{device}, time_interval = #{timeInterval}, equipment_no = #{equipmentNo}, visit_no = #{visitNo}, register = #{register}, reg_prn_flag = #{regPrnFlag}, cnslt_no = #{cnsltNo}, exam_reason = #{examReason}, priority_indicator = #{priorityIndicator}, special_indicator = #{specialIndicator}, share_exam_no = #{shareExamNo}, pause_indicator = #{pauseIndicator}, db_user = #{dbUser}, cnslt_name = #{cnsltName}, print_status = #{printStatus}, ward_code = #{wardCode}, rcpt_no = #{rcptNo}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exam_appoints( id, exam_no, patient_id, visit_id, local_id_class, patient_local_id, name, name_phonetic, sex, date_of_birth, birth_place, identity, charge_type, mailing_address, zip_code, phone_number, exam_class, exam_sub_class, clin_symp, phys_sign, relevant_lab_test, relevant_diag, clin_diag, exam_mode, exam_group, performed_by, patient_source, facility, req_date_time, req_dept, req_physician, req_memo, scheduled_date, notice, costs, charges, doctor_user, worked_indicator, isread, emergency_indicator, billing_indicator, cnslt_state, queue_no, device, time_interval, equipment_no, visit_no, register, reg_prn_flag, cnslt_no, exam_reason, priority_indicator, special_indicator, share_exam_no, pause_indicator, db_user, cnslt_name, print_status, ward_code ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{examNo}, #{patientId}, #{visitId}, #{localIdClass}, #{patientLocalId}, #{name}, #{namePhonetic}, #{sex}, #{dateOfBirth}, #{birthPlace}, #{identity}, #{chargeType}, #{mailingAddress}, #{zipCode}, #{phoneNumber}, #{examClass}, #{examSubClass}, #{clinSymp}, #{physSign}, #{relevantLabTest}, #{relevantDiag}, #{clinDiag}, #{examMode}, #{examGroup}, #{performedBy}, #{patientSource}, #{facility}, #{reqDateTime}, #{reqDept}, #{reqPhysician}, #{reqMemo}, #{scheduledDate}, #{notice}, #{costs}, #{charges}, #{doctorUser}, #{workedIndicator}, #{isread}, #{emergencyIndicator}, #{billingIndicator}, #{cnsltState}, #{queueNo}, #{device}, #{timeInterval}, #{equipmentNo}, #{visitNo}, #{register}, #{regPrnFlag}, #{cnsltNo}, #{examReason}, #{priorityIndicator}, #{specialIndicator}, #{shareExamNo}, #{pauseIndicator}, #{dbUser}, #{cnsltName}, #{printStatus}, #{wardCode} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM exam_appoints a WHERE a.patient_id = #{patientId}
